control.name: pivotGridControl
control.description: In this demo, the CreateDrillDownDataSourceAsync method is called to obtain a list of records that is used to calculate a summary value for the specified cell asynchronously.

control.name: rgDataSources
control.description: Sets whether the data source is an OLAP cube or a randomly generated table data source.

control.name: btnGenerateDataSource
control.description: Generates a database and establishes a connection to it.
